languages.text: "Я... Мою младшую сестру забрали во дворец. Ваша Светлость, она была совсем маленькая... когда я думаю о том, что с ней стало, я хочу убить всех — губернатора и каждого, кто ее защищает". {n}Мальчишка сглатывает.{/n} "Мы все скорбим по своим утратам".

traits.locale_text: "Я... Мою младшую сестру забрали во дворец. Ваше Благородие, она была совсем маленькая... когда я думаю о том, что с ней стало, я хочу убить всех, кто губернатора и всех, кто ее защищает". {n}Мальчишка сглатывает.{/n} "Мы все скорбим по своим утратам".

languages.text: "I... My little sister was taken to the palace. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, she was so little... Whenever I think about what happened to her, I want to kill everyone, the governor and everyone protecting her." {n}The boy swallows.{/n} "All of us are grieving our own losses."
languages.original_text: "Я... Мою младшую сестру забрали во дворец. Ваша Светлость, она была совсем маленькая... когда я думаю о том, что с ней стало, я хочу убить всех, кто губернатора и всех, кто ее защищает". {n}Мальчишка сглатывает.{/n} "Мы все скорбим по своим утратам".

traits.locale_text: "I... My little sister was taken to the palace. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, she was so little... Whenever I think about what happened to her, I want to kill everyone, the governor and everyone protecting her." {n}The boy swallows.{/n} "All of us are grieving our own losses."

"I... My little sister was taken to the palace. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, she was so little... Whenever I think about what happened to her, I want to kill everyone, the governor and everyone protecting her." {n}The boy swallows.{/n} "All of us are grieving our own losses."

"I... My little sister was taken to the palace. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, she was so little... Whenever I think about what happened to her, I want to kill everyone, the governor and everyone protecting her." {n}The boy swallows.{/n} "All of us are grieving our own losses."

"I... My little sister was taken to the palace. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, she was so little... Whenever I think about what happened to her, I want to kill everyone, the governor and everyone protecting her." {n}The boy swallows.{/n} "All of us are grieving our own losses."

languages.text: 「僕は…妹が宮殿に連れて行かれたんです、陛下、彼女はまだとても幼くて…。妹に起きたことを考えるたびに、総督も、総督を守ってるやつらも、みんな殺してやりたくなるんです」{n}少年はつばを飲み込む。{/n}「僕らはみんな、失った悲しみに暮れているんです」
languages.original_text: "I... My little sister was taken to the palace. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, she was so little... Whenever I think about what happened to her, I want to kill everyone, the governor and everyone protecting her." {n}The boy swallows.{/n} "All of us are grieving our own losses."

traits.locale_text: 「僕は…妹が宮殿に連れて行かれたんです、陛下、彼女はまだとても幼くて…。妹に起きたことを考えるたびに、総督も、総督を守ってるやつらも、みんな殺してやりたくなるんです」{n}少年はつばを飲み込む。{/n}「僕らはみんな、失った悲しみに暮れているんです」

languages.text: “我……我的小妹妹就被带到了那座宫殿里，大人。她还那么小……每当我想到她的遭遇，我就想把所有人都杀光，包括总督和那些为虎作伥的人。”{n}男孩咽了咽口水。{/n}“我们所有人都在为失去的一切悲伤不已。”
languages.original_text: "I... My little sister was taken to the palace. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, she was so little... Whenever I think about what happened to her, I want to kill everyone, the governor and everyone protecting her." {n}The boy swallows.{/n} "All of us are grieving our own losses."

traits.locale_text: “我……我的小妹妹就被带到了那座宫殿里，大人。她还那么小……每当我想到她的做鱼，我就想把所有人都杀光，包括总督和那些为虎作伥的人。”{n}男孩咽了咽口水。{/n}“我们所有人都在为失去的一切悲伤不已。”

languages.text: «A mi... hermana pequeña se la llevaron a palacio. {mf|Milord|Milady}, era muy pequeña... Cuando me pongo a pensar qué fue de ella, me dan ganas de cargarme a todo el mundo: a la gobernadora y a todos sus guardias». {n}El muchacho traga saliva.{/n} «Aquí no hay nadie que no llore la muerte de alguien».
languages.original_text: "I... My little sister was taken to the palace. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, she was so little... Whenever I think about what happened to her, I want to kill everyone, the governor and everyone protecting her." {n}The boy swallows.{/n} "All of us are grieving our own losses."

traits.locale_text: «A mi... hermana pequeña se la llevaron a palacio. {mf|Milord|Milady}, era muy pequeña... Cuando me pongo a pensar qué fue de ella, me dan ganas de cargarme a todo el mundo: a la gobernadora y a todos sus guardias». {n}El muchacho traga saliva.{/n} «Aquí no hay nadie que no llore la muerte de alguien».

languages.text: "Ich ... meine kleine Schwester wurde in den Palast gebracht. Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, sie war noch so klein ... Wenn ich daran denke, was ihr widerfahren ist, will ich alle töten, die Gouverneurin und jeden, der sie beschützt." {n}Der Junge schluckt.{/n} "Wir alle trauern um unsere eigenen Verluste."
languages.original_text: "I... My little sister was taken to the palace. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, she was so little... Whenever I think about what happened to her, I want to kill everyone, the governor and everyone protecting her." {n}The boy swallows.{/n} "All of us are grieving our own losses."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... meine kleine Schwester wurde in den Palast gebracht. Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, sie war noch so klein ... Wenn ich daran denke, was ihr widerfahren ist, will ich alle töten, die Gouverneurin und jeden, der sie beschützt." {n}Der Junge schluckt.{/n} "Wir alle trauern um unsere eigenen Verluste."

languages.text: « Je... Ma petite sœur a été emmenée au palais. C'était qu'une gamine, Votre Seigneurie... Quand je pense à ce qui lui est arrivé, j'ai envie de tuer tout le monde, la gouverneure et tous ceux qui la protègent ! » {n}Le garçon déglutit.{/n} « On a tous perdu des êtres chers. »
languages.original_text: "I... My little sister was taken to the palace. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, she was so little... Whenever I think about what happened to her, I want to kill everyone, the governor and everyone protecting her." {n}The boy swallows.{/n} "All of us are grieving our own losses."

traits.locale_text: « Je... Ma petite sœur a été emmenée au palais. C'était qu'une gamine, Votre Seigneurie... Quand je pense à ce qui lui est arrivé, j'ai envie de tuer tout le monde, la gouverneure et tous ceux qui la protègent ! » {n}Le garçon déglutit.{/n} « On a tous perdu des êtres chers. »

languages.text: "Ben... Kız kardeşimi saraya götürdüler. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, daha çok küçüktü. Ona olanları her düşündüğümde herkesi, valiyi ve onu koruyan herkesi öldürmek istiyorum." {n}Çocuk yutkunuyor.{/n} "Hepimiz kayıplarımız için yas tutuyoruz."
languages.original_text: "I... My little sister was taken to the palace. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, she was so little... Whenever I think about what happened to her, I want to kill everyone, the governor and everyone protecting her." {n}The boy swallows.{/n} "All of us are grieving our own losses."

traits.locale_text: "Ben... Kız kardeşimi saraya götürdüler. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, daha çok küçüktü. Ona olanları her düşündüğümde herkesi, valiyi ve onu koruyan herkesi öldürmek istiyorum." {n}Çocuk yutkunuyor.{/n} "Hepimiz kayıplarımız için yas tutuyoruz."
